title: The problem with ranked matches
body:
Now I have a problem with ranked matches guys like this crap person ruin games for everyone goes by the name on league 
LordPeace13 never tanked in match didn't help team to try get sated.
15 min in game didn't even get a dragon stil no gank and we been ganked 2-3 times already and I play support Braun 
Now it's not easy trying to rank being support so please RIOT FIX THIS PROBLEM BEING MATCHED UP WITH PEOPLE WHO RUIN IT FOR EVERYONE.
I DONT HAVE TIME LIKE EVEYRONE DOES VUT THIS RUINS THE FUN FOR ME TRYING TO PUSH OUR OF BRONZE  AND THIS IS WHY IM STUCK IN BRONZE BECAUSE PEOPLE LIKE THAT GUY

replies.body:
**First of all, you are going to have to remove the guys name as it is [against the rules](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment). **

Second of all, you are going to have to come to terms with the fact that you are bronze 4 and not everyone is going to play the game like you want them to. It is really common for junglers to ignore their team to get sated. If you notice that you have a devourer jungler on your team, you should be doing your part to play safely so they don't need to babysit your lane and so that the game doesn't progress too fast. If you really need the help, be sure to ping them and super sweetly ask for a gank (I feel that you maybe weren't so nice in doing this). 

Lastly, if you want to avoid players like this in the future, [I would suggest joining a premade team](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment). You build relationships, can learn to fit with each others play styles, have A+ communication and avoid toxins like feeders/afks/general potatoes. With all of the incentives being thrown at you (increased IP, mastery points and hextech stuff) there is literally nothing to lose ♥

Note: Riot is unlikely to do anything to this player just because he wanted to farm till sated.

Remove the guys name.

Naming and Shaming not allowed
